body: Immerse yourself in the rich flavors and heritage of The Bahamas. Our national cuisine feast is a testament to our island's history and resilience. From peas & rice to guava duff, every dish tells a story. Come share your pride and celebrate Majority Rule Day with us! ğŸ’ª
